text:
July 26, 1956
Mr. M. S. Novik
300 West 23rd Street
Suite 1200
New York 11, New York
Bear Maury I
Sounds like your return trip was too eventful for pleasure.
Send squib for Newsletter, if you can get a quick one off quickly.
Did your luggage (and souvenirs, papers, oto.} have to left on
board?
Mara sorry to hear of it. Eut glad you’re sound of limb.
How about a final bill, when time, for Management • ervice, too, so
we can close our account. We’d like within the next ten days, if
possible, since we need to make final report to Ford, flake it for
three months, April, May and June, for 1625.00. If you’ve had ad¬
ditional expenses, we can pay not over 225.00 on an actual expense
basis besides.
Welcome back,
Harry J. Skoraia
Executive Director
HJSijmf
oci i chert Coleman (NAEB Treasurer)
Judith eterson (NL)
